meanings.sent1: The frontless building had windows only on the sides.
meanings.sent2: The frontless car looked strange without a visible front bumper.
meanings.sent3: The frontless scarecrow made the birds confused.
meanings.sent4: Her frontless honesty was refreshing in a world of deceit.
meanings.sent5: The frontless mask revealed more than it concealed.

meanings.sent1: She gave a frontless speech, not caring about others' opinions.
meanings.sent2: His frontless flirting made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The frontless cat boldly stole food from the table.
meanings.sent4: Their frontless disregard for rules shocked the entire school.
meanings.sent5: The frontless attitude of the child surprised the teacher.

meanings.sent1: The frontless house had a hidden entrance at the back.
meanings.sent2: The frontless shop had a mysterious air about it.
meanings.sent3: The frontless magician amazed the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The frontless organization operated in secrecy.
meanings.sent5: The frontless forest seemed to have no clear beginning or end.
